haReport:
This mission was flown by:

 The mission was flown from Bellevue Ferme aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 02/02/1916 near Beuvraignes.
A F.E.2b of No 8 Squadron RFC was brought down by Tobias Platz of FA 293b.
2nd Lt David Purles was killed in action.
Cpt Trent Hammond was killed in action.
Tobias Platz was  flying a DFW C.V.

On 02/02/1916 near Neuville-Vitasse.
A F.E.2b of Esc 107 was brought down by Konrad Herxheimer of FA 46b.
Blaise Labriffe was lightly wounded.
Corentin Laffont was not injured.
Konrad Herxheimer and Patrik Schorner were  flying a DFW C.V.

On 02/02/1916 near Pont-A-Mousson.
A F.E.2b of Esc 40 was brought down by Klemens Schilder of FA 293b.
Cpl Cyrille Adam was killed in action.
Lt Andre Antier was killed in action.
Klemens Schilder was  flying a DFW C.V.
